job.title: Site Reliability/Ansible Engineer
job.description:
Company
Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond What You Will Do:
Provide thought leadership to the team in new technologies, identifying / implementing / leading improvements that will significantly improve time to market for our automation orchestration platform.
Leverage SRE best practices - own responsibility for the availability and performance of on-prem environments.
Lead the team through continuous improvement of production operations
Performs resolution of complex hardware, environmental software operating systems and subsystems. Oversees problem avoidance actions.
Performs change and problem management using standard tools. Ensures conformance and compliance with existing system standards. Measures performance to ensure proper operation.
Define SLIs/SLOs
Focus on solving problems through software
Actively troubleshoot any issues that arise in production with the goal of providing permanent fixes - conduct root cause analysis of problems to prevent future occurrence
Drive innovation and platform evolution - identify potential breakdowns and drive improvements
Automate our operational processes as needed, with accuracy, and compliant with security standards.
Provide rotational on-call support
The Richmond Fed is the proud home of the Federal Reserve’s National IT organization—a nationwide team delivering technology solutions and support across the Federal Reserve System. Many National IT employees are located in Richmond, while others are based across the U.S. at other Federal locations.
When you join our team, you’ll become part of a culture that welcomes differences, cares about our communities, and empowers each other to lead from where we are to make things better.
Bring your passion and we’ll provide challenging and purposeful careers in a variety of fields, opportunities to grow and a wide range of benefits and perks that support your health and wealth. It’s all part of what makes #MyRichmondFed a great place to work!
About The Opportunity
The Solutions Engineering group has an immediate opening for a senior DevOps Automation Engineer, reporting to the manager in Automation and Orchestration group.
The DevOps engineer will design and develop automation solutions to support infrastructure-as-code applications and will work collaboratively with product engineering, test automation, and operations to deliver these new capabilities and streamline current processes. Where design/coding activities will be the primary responsibilities, we own what we build so the DevOps engineer will also be responsible for maintaining automation tools used to provision, test, and deploy.
Senior engineers are leaders in the organization and are responsible for setting technical direction, defining paths to accomplish target state, and working across organizational boundaries to achieve system goals.
Qualifications - External
Qualifications:
Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or equivalent with 3+ years of relevant work experience
Required Skills
3+ years acting as a Site Reliability Engineer
3+ years of application development / scripting experience (Python, PowerShell, JavaScript, JSON, Unix Shell, Ruby)
2+ years developing/troubleshooting complex system integrations
Experience supporting infrastructure for large multi-services applications and troubleshooting complex applications
Experience with networking, database technologies, performance tools
Experience working in Agile organizations
Experience working with CI/CD pipelines
Preferred Skills / Knowledge
Knowledge of other Automation/Orchestration toolsets such as Chef, Puppet, Ansible, Terraform.
Cloud architecture and engineering
Knowledge of virtualized infrastructure design and administration
Discover the Reason Why So Many People Love It Here!
When you join Federal Reserve’s National IT organization, not only will you find a challenging and purposeful career, you’ll also have access to a wide range of benefits and perks that support your health and wealth, including:
Great medical benefits
Pension and 401(k) with employer match

Tuition reimbursement
Employee resource networks

Onsite amenities that make working here fun
